page.title: 12MOTTINGHAM WEEK
page.content: {At The Fete} there was a bouncy castle which everyone went on and there were lots of games and also there was apple juice for free and there was a game called Mouse in the House and it was 10p to have a go on and if you won you got 50p .There were games like throwing mops at cans and knocking coconuts down .There were raffles and there was a fire engine and everyone was climbing on it and it was a good time. On Sunday 16th June there was a {Miini Marathon} old and young entered, 570 people altogether. You could run 1.5 miles or 3.3 miles. When you finished you got a goody bag with a certifcate, a paper hat, pen, badge and leaflet.All the money collected went to the Brook Hospital Scanner Appeal.
